message: I'm feeling generous. Let's split it 90/10 in my favor. I'm sure you'll see the value in a quick and easy deal.
I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 60/40, a fair and reasonable deal.
I'm still willing to negotiate, but my offer is firm. Let's split it 65/35. We can avoid further rounds and get this done.
I'm not budging. Let's meet in the middle at 50/50. It's a fair split and we can finally end this.
